name: tokicheck
description: TOKİCheck - Rent to Installment decision support and scenario simulator
author: TOKİCheck Contributors

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/web
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/types && npm run build --workspace=packages/engine
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=apps/web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
